main event: On June 27, 1966, a witness observed a disc-like object, about the size of a medium-sized airplane, in Boothville, Louisiana.
interesting points: The object was described as round and color similar to dull aluminum,It appeared to hover and then move away at high speed,The witness observed the object for approximately 5 minutes,The estimated speed of the object varied from 50 mph to possibly 500 mph,The sighting was reported to the police the following morning.
witness description: The witness was an airline ticket agent working in the Boothville area.
